full_summary:
# Business Process Re-Engineering (BPR) Consultant - Level 3 Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Summary

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites TBIPS SA Holders to participate in a competitive solicitation for up to two (2) Business Process Re-Engineering (BPR) Consultants – Senior to support the Travellers Business and Information Framework (TBIF) team. The objective is to acquire resources with expertise in enterprise and business architecture to guide the TBIF development and integration into the Project Management Framework (PMF) used within CBSA.

## Background

The CBSA is undertaking the Traveller Modernization (TM) initiative, transitioning from in-person interactions to a digital self-service model. The Travellers Branch aims to leverage the TBIF to improve business process integration, information management, and technology capabilities.

## Scope of Work

The successful BPR Consultants – Senior will:

* Enhance and expand the TBIF
* Fill existing gaps within the TBIF
* Integrate the TBIF into the PMF

## Eligibility

Only TBIPS SA Holders currently holding a TBIPS SA in the National Capital Region (NCR) under the EN578-170432 series of SAs are invited to participate.

## Proposal Requirements

* Respondents must review the Solicitation Documents, which are available on CanadaBuys
* Proposals must be submitted by September 1, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* Selected TBIPS SA Holders will be invited to submit a bid

## Trade Agreements

This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and international free trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA).

## Contact Information

Veronique Fulham

Phone: (555) 555-5555
Email: CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca

## Attachments

* Amendment 1
* Amendment 2
* Amendment 3
* Amendment 4
* Amendment 5
* RFP Amendment 6
* RFP-EN (English)
* RFP-FR (French)

## Important Dates

* Amendment Date: September 1, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 1, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Note: The solicitation documents and attachments
